entry.title: Game: Environmental Station Alpha (Steam, 2015) (9)
entry.content:
Game: Environmental Station Alpha (Steam, 2015) (9)20151217
I played today for about two hours and ended up beating the
game. There were a few really weird things. I managed to beat it
without going to an area that was blinking and I never could
figure out how to get there. I wandered randomly for a long time
and eventually found a way to get to a super powered upgraded. It
was really hard to get it, but it was awesome. The ending of the
game was pretty sad. It makes me curious if there is a different
way to beat the game and get a "good ending". I think the game
plays really well and the bosses are very fun. I think the
traversal of the world is not great though, because there are so
many dead-ends, one-way drops, and inconveniences. While it is fun
to play the game, it is not fun to plan your trip and get where
you want to go. Unlike SoTN, for instance, the enemies generally
just swarm you and it's not a fun little "boxing" match to take
them down. In summary, I definitely enjoyed the game, but I don't
love it and don't expect to play it again.

Total time: 12:53
  • Video Games
  • Environmental Station Alpha
  • Steam
  • 2015

entry.title: Game: Mushihimesama (Steam, 2015)
entry.content:
Game: Mushihimesama (Steam, 2015)20151217
I tried out each mode of this just to see how it looked and
felt. The port seems pretty good. As with most shmups, I'll have
to concentrate and dedicate myself to it to play it. I mainly
bought it, however, because I expect that it will encourage CAVE
to release their games that I like the most on Steam.

Total time: 0:15
  • Video Games
  • Mushihimesama
  • Steam
  • 2015

entry.title: Dragon Ball Z - Season 1 - Episode 3 - Gohan's Hidden Powers
entry.content:
Dragon Ball Z - Season 1 - Episode 3 - Gohan's Hidden Powers20151216
It's nice to see crazy attacks like the "Special Beam Cannon" and
the recurring theme that Goku is too trusting. I like that Gohan
is insanely powerful.

  • Dragon Ball Z

entry.title: Dragon Ball Z - Season 1 - Episode 4 - Goku's Unusual Journey
entry.content:
Dragon Ball Z - Season 1 - Episode 4 - Goku's Unusual Journey20151216
It's crazy that Goku is so willing to die and immediately
does. What an auspicious start. I like the idea that he will be
trained as a spirit, while Gohan is trained by the major villain
from Dragon Ball.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball Z

entry.title: Dragon Ball Z - Season 1 - Episode 1 - The Arrival of Raditz
entry.content:
Dragon Ball Z - Season 1 - Episode 1 - The Arrival of Raditz20151215
I like the suddenly crazier story and the way that the universe
gets a lot bigger. It's funny that Gohan is like Goku was but
still different. I like that Piccolo was trashed by Raditz.

entry.title: Game: Environmental Station Alpha (Steam, 2015) (8)
entry.content:
Game: Environmental Station Alpha (Steam, 2015) (8)20151214
I played for a while and continued exploring. I tried a few
different paths but kept getting stuck by new obstacles. It is
very cool the way that the overgrowth and then the robots have
changed the structure of the map. I turned on the computers and am
trying to fight the Ancient Robot boss. It is quite hard.

Total time: 11:00
  • Video Games
  • Environmental Station Alpha
  • Steam
  • 2015

entry.title: Game: Invisible, Inc. (Steam, 2015) (4)
entry.content:
Game: Invisible, Inc. (Steam, 2015) (4)20151214
I played two missions. I did a hard one to procure a Vault Key but
then when I went to the Vault, I couldn't get anything from it
because I never found the Vault itself before I started getting
overrun. I feel like even though I'm playing on the introductory
difficulty setting, I am way under-powered compared to the
opponents. I think it may mean that I've made some bad upgrading
choices. Maybe I will investigate what some top-level play looks
like.

Total time: 3:30
  • Video Games
  • Invisible, Inc.
  • Steam
  • 2015
